exif.ImageDescription: I met Avizo and Akangla by chance a couple of days before their wedding. (Avizo is related to Kevizaselie Nagi who I met earlier in the day.) It turns out that the couple became an online sensation as their wedding invitation had gone viral. It read: "We eloped! Now let's celebrate..." The couple made peace with the fact that her parents weren't happy with their inter-tribe marriage and decided to boycott the wedding. [Akangla Longkumer, +91 97175 98707, Avizo Nagi +91 94028 68417]

photography.description: I met Avizo and Akangla by chance a couple of days before their wedding. (Avizo is related to Kevizaselie Nagi who I met earlier in the day.) It turns out that the couple became an online sensation as their wedding invitation had gone viral. It read: "We eloped! Now let's celebrate..." The couple made peace with the fact that her parents weren't happy with their inter-tribe marriage and decided to boycott the wedding. [Akangla Longkumer, +91 97175 98707, Avizo Nagi +91 94028 68417]
photography.title: I met Avizo and Akangla by chance a couple of days before their wedding

exif.ImageDescription: I met Temsu during my last trip to Nagaland (Peter & Friends 2010). At that time he used to work as a postman at a post office deep in a forest near Mokokchung. Over the years, he got transferred to the main post office in Kohima. Temsu is now a postal asssitant. He and his wife of two years are expecting their first child next month.

exif.ImageDescription: ZhaZo is a photographer whose work I got acquainted with a couple of years ago. I saw an exhibition of his work at D Cafe and decided to contact him. We met up at Hornbill Festival and bonded over his tribe's rice beer. It turned out that his girlfriend is Merenla. She's a famous youtube star and standup comedian based in Mumbai. Merenla routinely uses her Naga identity in her scripts. We met art Merenla's grandfather's house for this portrait.

photography.description: ZhaZo is a photographer whose work I got acquainted with a couple of years ago. I saw an exhibition of his work at D Cafe and decided to contact him. We met up at Hornbill Festival and bonded over his tribe's rice beer. It turned out that his girlfriend is Merenla. She's a famous youtube star and standup comedian based in Mumbai. Merenla routinely uses her Naga identity in her scripts. We met art Merenla's grandfather's house for this portrait.
photography.title: ZhaZo is a photographer whose work I got acquainted with a couple of years ago

exif.ImageDescription: Preparations preceeding the feast of Akangla & Avizo's wedding. Six pigs were slaughtered for the feast. This is the last one awaiting its destiny. As I was leaving, a man gave it four-five-six blows to the head with an axe, bringing it to a slow end.

exif.ImageDescription: From D cafe above her building,  I saw her down below sitting by the window and sipping tea. I had to make a portrait of her, the first one of this trip. Peter and I went through the maze of Kohima's streets to find her. She obliged shyly.

photography.description: From D cafe above her building,  I saw her down below sitting by the window and sipping tea. I had to make a portrait of her, the first one of this trip. Peter and I went through the maze of Kohima's streets to find her. She obliged shyly.
photography.title: From D cafe above her building,  I saw her down below sitting by the window and sipping tea

exif.ImageDescription: I was at Kohima's popular D Cafe when the distinctively attired George walked in. He sat at a table and played his guitar, singing along to the tunes playing on the cafe's music system. I thought he was an aspiring young musician. It turned out that he was actually an assistant professor of archology at a local university.

photography.description: I was at Kohima's popular D Cafe when the distinctively attired George walked in. He sat at a table and played his guitar, singing along to the tunes playing on the cafe's music system. I thought he was an aspiring young musician. It turned out that he was actually an assistant professor of archology at a local university.
photography.title: I was at Kohima's popular D Cafe when the distinctively attired George walked in

exif.ImageDescription: I was at a fair at Solidarity Park when I saw Ketsei arrive on his motorcycle. I mistook his bike to be a Harley-Davidson but it turned out to be a heavily modified Bajaj Avenger with a Harley logo stuck on to it. Ketsei is a dealer of motorcycle spares and accessories. He belongs to Angami tribe and lives in Kohima village, the original owners of the land on which the city stands today.

photography.description: I was at a fair at Solidarity Park when I saw Ketsei arrive on his motorcycle. I mistook his bike to be a Harley-Davidson but it turned out to be a heavily modified Bajaj Avenger with a Harley logo stuck on to it. Ketsei is a dealer of motorcycle spares and accessories. He belongs to Angami tribe and lives in Kohima village, the original owners of the land on which the city stands today.
photography.title: I was at a fair at Solidarity Park when I saw Ketsei arrive on his motorcycle

exif.ImageDescription: Preparations preceeding the feast of Akangla & Avizo's wedding. Here we witness the making of 'modi' - a sought-after preparation of beef wrapped in a banana leaf and distributed to guests as a parting gift.
